Description: TGM Sudley Crossing Apartments feature premiere 1 and 2 bedroom apartments with gourmet eat-in kitchens, breakfast rooms and bars, and equipped with washers and dryers in every home. Enjoy the community's Olympic-size swimming pool, resident lounge and cyber-cafe, 24-hour athletic club with key fob access, childrens pool and outdoor spa, tennis courts, and daily complimentary coffee and cookies. Best of all, experience the quality resident services provided by TGM Communities. In addition, your pets are welcome here! The immediate neighborhood features popular retail, shopping and entertainment centers including The Manassas Mall with Macys, JC Penney, Sears, and WalMart and down the street is Bull Run Plaza with Dicks Sporting Goods, Shopper's Food Warehouse, Sweet Frog, and many others. Best Buy, Lowe's, and Costco are nearby as well. Enjoy great dining, events, and attractions in Old Town Manassas. Experience better living at TGM Communities - welcome to TGM Sudley Crossing!

Situated in one of the country's most desirable places to live and work, this stunning apartment community reveals comfort and style with built in bookcases and gas fireplaces. Description: Amberton Apartments offers the apartments in Manassas you've been looking for and didn't expect to find. These luxury apartments in Virginia are perfectly situated, just a mile off I-66 and within minutes of shopping, dining and entertainment, including Sudley Manor Square Shopping Center, Manassas Mall and some of the most beautiful golf courses, parks and historic sites in the state. For even more, head into nearby Arlington, VA or Washington, DC for a seemingly unlimited array of nightlife, shopping and cultural landmarks. The Manassas apartments for rent at Amberton make getting around easier than ever. With its natural beauty and convenience to one of the most important metropolitan areas in the world, Manassas is a great place to live. Make the most of this extraordinary town by moving to Amberton. Please call for an appointment today.

Description: Lease your Apartment in Manassas, VA at Rosemary Ridge. Quaint charm, city convenience. Come to where the real Virginia begins, and you'll understand why Manassas has become the new alternative to the hectic pace of today's suburban living. The lovely garden-style apartment homes of Rosemary Ridge are designed for people who value quiet time, family outings and, above all, living well. Truly, life in Manassas is far from ordinary. Yet living here means you're just as connected to the D.C. area as any suburbanite. From the historic Manassas Train Depot, the signature icon of Old Town, you can connect with the city and the world via a full schedule of daily Amtrak and Virginia Railway Express commuter trains. With so much to do in the area, you'll be glad to be in the middle of it all ? in your great apartment home at Rosemary Ridge.

Description: Discover The Courts At Historic Manassas! Located in the heart of historic Manassas, the past is present everywhere. Charming buildings dating from the late 1800's to the turn of the 20th Century line the quiet streets. The Courts at Historic Manassas is a new rental community, a private enclave, built in the revitalized historic area of Manassas and offers all the convenience, comforts, and amenities of a quaint hometown. At the Courts, you can select your future home from a variety of floor plans, some featuring sunrooms, and dens. The Courts also offer all the luxury details you expect in your new home from modern kitchens and baths with granite countertops, washer and dryer, and garage parking. Plus, the Courts is just steps away from the Railroad Depot, built in 1914. You can stroll to nearby shops, galleries, and restaurants. Walk to the theater and see a play, or just enjoy the fresh air and relaxation that surrounds.

Description: Wellington Place at Olde Town offers remarkable amenities and stylish apartments in Manassas. We offer studios, one and two bedroom apartments, and two bedroom townhouses. Each apartment has a washer/dryer for your convenience. Select apartment homes feature energy-saving appliances, vaulted ceilings, fireplaces, and balconies or patios with extra storage. Our residents enjoy access to our fitness center with racquetball court, business center, car wash station, and Olympic-sized swimming pool. Nestled near I-66 and the Virginia Railway Express, Wellington Place at Olde Town provides access to dining, shopping, and premier work centers. Enjoy close proximity to the historic district of Manassas featuring quaint antique shops and novelty stores. A short drive will take you to the Nissan Pavilion, the Racetrack, and the Prince William Fairgrounds. With the best of Northern Virginia at your doorstep, come home to Wellington Place at Olde Town and experience better apartment living.

Our Spacious one, two and three bedroom floorplans feature fully equipped kitchens, extra storage and separate dining areas, which make for easy organization and plenty of space. The community offers a wealth of amenities such as a relaxing swimming pool, beautiful lake views and scenic jogging trails. Historic Old Town Manassas is just minutes away, with charming cafes, eclectic eateries and an array of unique shops and specialty vendors. Brimming with history, Old Town hosts several museums and historical attractions that make the area so unique. Everything you could possibly need is right at your doorstep. Come live the life you deserve at Brentwood.

Description:
Smile and enjoy because Orchard Glen Apartments is defining a relaxed and quiet community to live at.
Ample Shopping, dining and entertainment are found within a minute of your Orchard Glen apartment. Living in Orchard Glen Apartments is sure to provide all the quality time you need.
All the benefits of apartment living let you live for fun. We invite you to explore Manassas apartment living by finding your new home here at Orchard Glen Apartments.
Please keep in mind that all utilities are separate (gas, water, and electric), some washing machines are coin-operated, and we have minimum income requirements based on the type of apartment.
Security Deposit starts at $800.00 and can go up based on credit history, rental verification, and employment verification. The average Security Deposit is as much as/above one month's rent, please expect that amount.
We have a minimum income requirement (no maximum) based on the type of apartment you choose.
Please feel free to call or email our Leasing Office with any and all questions, our staff is more than happy to assist you and we love to be able to share as much information as possible!

Description:
Looking for roommate/tenant for a spare room in a 3 bedroom townhouse located in Manassas Virginia. I am a 30 year old High School teacher looking for a non-smoking, responsible roommate (male or female) in their 20s/30s (though other ages will be considered) for spare bedroom in my townhouse. Rent is $650 a month, though I will entertain other offers. This does not include utilities (gas, electricity, internet, etc.) but I am willing to negotiate a flat-fee that includes all of those things if you'd find that preferable. You can either request your initial deposit back at the end of your lease, or you can contribute it to first month's rent.
The townhouse includes a furnished living room with a large flat-screen TV, fully-furnished dining room, kitchen with many appliances, an office/storage room, and fenced in backyard—all shared-use spaces (please see attached pictures). There are two parking spaces associated with the home, one of which would be for my new roommate. There are also “visitor parking spaces” nearby for guests.
The spare bedroom is 12 ft x 9 ft; currently dark blue but ok if tenant paints to his or her liking. There is an average-sized closet attached. Bathroom for tenant across hallway; I won’t use it, and guests will only occasionally. (See attached)
Must be comfortable with dogs: 2 very playful dogs – 5 year old Boston terrier and 2 year old mixed breed—located in the household. These dogs are super friendly once they get used to you, and very quickly start to consider roommates as part of their "pack." 
The Townhouse is located in a convenient area -- 5 minute drive to 66 as well as minutes to local shopping areas (Giant, Starbucks, Best Buy, Barnes and Noble, Petsmart, Manassas Mall, etc.). 25 minutes to closest metro (Vienna).
Please email (danielkgeroe@gmail.com) or call (757-373-5969) with any questions or interest in viewing the house and the available room.

Description: Beautiful End Unit Townhome style condo in the City of Manassas is move in ready. Features include a 2 story Great Room w/ Fireplace Open Kitchen Dining Room 2 Master Suites - each with private bath and a Bonus Loft off the 2nd level master. 1 Car Attached Garage - Private walkway/entrance. Within easy access to 3 VRE stations shopping dining and much more. Available immediately.

Description: Beautiful TH in Point of Woods conveniently located to everything! 4 large bedrooms & 3FULL bathrooms! Lots of natural light w/views of community garden & gazebo. Basement W/O to brick patio w/extra storage! Dining opens to large deck ready for furniture! Huge laundry room w/full-size W&D. Sought after community w/TONS of amenities! Sorry no pets. Occupancy 2 weeks from app approval.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: Beautifully maintained home inside and out! Cul de sac location! Gourmet Kitchen has stainless appliances and granite countertops. Finished basement with media room. W/O basement w/media & large guest suite and full bathroom. 2 Story foyer. Large Master suite w/sitting area. Description:
(703) 330-1776 - Manassas Townhouse for Rent - All brick townhome in City of Manassas. Over 2,100 sqft on 3 levels; 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, 2 living spaces & separate dining. Spacious kitchen w/table space, newer appliances & tons of cabinet space. Large Master Suite w/walk-in closet! Private, fenced rear yard w/patio & second level deck! Across the street from open common area and community garden. Near Rt28, transportation, shopping & restaurants. 2 parking spaces. 18 month + lease term available.
Tenant is responsible for all utilities, interior and exterior maintenance, and renter's insurance. Pets not allowed. Not participating with Section 8.
Home is professionally managed by Freedom Property Management and offered for rent by Tiffany Suarez with Homestead Realty.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3602297) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- attic-access only, laundry area, blinds, oven/range-electric, range hood, exhaust fans, interior townhouse, master walk-in closet, master bathroom, tot lots/plygrd, near schools, near vre, w/w carpeting, Yard, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description: On a knoll overlooking historic Manassas, Prince William County, and beyond to the Blue Ridge Mountains, Manassas Meadows Apartment Homes combine character and charm with the comforts and convenience of carefree residential living. This traditional all brick community offers impressive energy efficient living. This affordable apartment community has one and two bedroom garden apartments for rent featuring fully equipped kitchens with dishwashers, disposals, continuous clean ranges and double-door, frost free refrigerators. There are full-sized washers and dryers, wall to wall carpeting, and private balconies or patios. Selected apartments offer skylights, cathedral ceilings, and fireplaces. Interstate 66, commuter buses, VRE trains, car pools, and both Manassas and Dulles Airports bring the rest of the world closer to Manassas Meadows. An abundant selection of shopping, dining, and entertainment areas, including the Nissan Pavilion are all available to you in the Manassas Community. Opportunities for recreation extend from the Blue Ridge Mountains to the shores of Lake Occoquan and the Potomac River. Prince William Forest Park and Manassas National battlefield are two nearby National Parks. You are invited to share with us the sophisticated elegance of Manassas Meadows Apartments. Our one Bedroom floor plan is a full 629 sq feet of living space and the two bedroom is 859 sq., ft.
